titles: Consuetudo, vel lex mercatoria, or The ancient law-merchant Diuided into three parts: according to the essentiall parts of trafficke. Necessarie for all statesmen, iudges, magistrates, temporall and ciuile lawyers, mint-men, merchants, marriners, and all others negotiating in all places of the world. By Gerard Malynes merchant.
author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
